name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 1989 Classic Arcade
summary: An Xbox Live Arcade version of the game was released under the name TMNT 1989 Classic Arcade. Like other classic arcade games on the Xbox 360 platform, portions of the original arcade game were emulated with network code and other new features added. Players could earn achievements as well as play 2-4 player co-op (both online and offline). This rerelease retains the music and voices of the 1989 arcade game.
